amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funds for energy efficiency and renewable energy by $24,018,000 by reducing funds for fossil energy research and development.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funds for energy efficiency and renewable energy by $24,018,000 by reducing funds for fossil energy research and development.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Miller (NC) amendment (A022) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 244 (Roll no. 544).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Miller (NC) amendment (A022) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 244 (Roll no. 544).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A022) offered by Mr. Miller (NC).
